title: Definitions
text: If we are looking at the differences between our third and first quartiles, we know that we are not describing Quartile $$1$$ or Quartile $$3$$.

title: Solution
text: Additionally, by the definition provided, we know that we are not looking for the Maximum or Minimum, since we are looking at a "range" rather than an exact value. Knowing this, what are we currently describing?
